Hi , I'm Kumar Prakhar

Computer Science Engineer | Web Designer | Data Analysis Enthusiast

This is ME, Kumar Prakhar, a second year undergraduate from Vellore Institute of Technology, Bhopal.
I am a budding Data Scientist and a Web Designer, who is obsessed with the idea of improving himself and wants a platform to grow and excel.
